H0.text: Although he never won an Oscar for best director, one of Hitchcock's films did win an Oscar for best picture. What was the film. Rebecca

H1.text: Although he never won an Oscar for best director, one of Hitchcock's films did win an Oscar for best picture. What was the film. Lifeboat

H2.text: Although he never won an Oscar for best director, one of Hitchcock's films did win an Oscar for best picture. What was the film. Notorious

H3.text: Although he never won an Oscar for best director, one of Hitchcock's films did win an Oscar for best picture. What was the film. Rifko

A4.text: Rebecca (1940 film), a 1940 film directed by Alfred Hitchcock based on du Maurier's novel
